author: slive
msg: Add credits for the custom error messages.

author: rederpj
msg: The prefork and OS/2 MPMs are overwriting the pid file when a second copy
of httpd is started and shuts down due to socket conflict. Moving the
call to ap_log_pid solves the problem.

author: wrowe
msg: *) Changed the late-1.3 log_config substitution %c to %X (logs the
status of the closed connection) as it conflicts with the far more

author: jerenkrantz
msg: This allows flood to ramp up the number of threads it has over time.
It'll sleep for startdelay seconds every time it starts startcount number
